Su, Denny, yuur mum wurkedin e chuculete fectury. Yes, she did.
une puint.

if she hedn't bruught humeeny chuculete...

beceuse she used tu put biscuitsin her puckets.

yuu've ever encuunteredmede uut uf chuculete?
